The name of file to read reuse data from, NULL if not a reuse run.
NB A run cannot be both reuse and continuation.
A reuse run is essentially a new calculation that tries to reuse as
much as possible from an earlier calculation.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: up to 255 character filename
Default value : NULL

num_dump_cycles.docstring:
Number of SCF cycles between wavefunction dumps.
If <=0 then no dumps will be written.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer)
Default value : 0

mix_spin_amp.docstring:
Determines the mixing amplitude of the charge density within DM scheme.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 2.0

calculate_raman.docstring:
Selects whether to compute Raman intensities as part of a phonon or efield linear-response calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

mix_history_length.docstring:
Determines the maximum number of charge/spin densities to be kept in the mixing history within DM scheme.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 7

spin_polarised.docstring:
Turns on/off spin polarisation (English spelling).
Modifiable: never
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE unless SPIN>0

sedc_n_obs.docstring:
Customisable n value for the damping function in the OBS semi-empirical dispersion/van der Waals correction scheme.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Default is determined by XC_FUNCTIONAL.

wannier_spread_type.docstring:
Selects definition for Wannier function spread functional.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: VANDERBILT, RESTA
Default value : VANDERBILT

write_none.docstring:
If WRITE_NONE=TRUE then suppress writing of extra output files.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

iprint.docstring:
Controls the amount of detail in the <seed>.castep output file.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: 1, 2, 3
Default value : 1

cut_off_energy.docstring:
Determines the cut-off energy for the plane wave basis set used.
Will override the BASIS_PRECISION value if also defined.
Modifiable: never
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : set by BASIS_PRECISION=FINE

ga_max_gens.docstring:
Maximum number of generations to evolve population for regardless of convergence.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 3*NUM_ATOMS

dipole_correction.docstring:
Determines the scheme used to correct spurious dipole-dipole interactions due to periodic boundary conditions.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: NONE, STATIC, SELF CONSISTENT
Default value : NONE

md_use_plumed.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to perform metadynamics using the PLUMED framework. To use this option you must compile and link against the PLUMED source, which you can find online at http://merlino.mi.infn.it/~plumed/PLUMED/Home.html
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

nbands.docstring:
The maximum number of bands at any given k-point and spin component.
Can also be determined by NEXTRA_BANDS or PERC_EXTRA_BANDS.
Modifiable: never
Allowed values: (any) >= MAX(NUP,NDOWN)
Default value : MAX(NUP,NDOWN) + (NEXTRA_BANDS or PERC_EXTRA_BANDS)

num_proc_in_smp.docstring:
Specifies the maximum number of active processors per node in an SMP-aware calculation.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 1

nlxc_impose_trs.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to impose time reversal symmetry on the Gamma point.
See also NLXC_EXCHANGE_REFLECT_KPTS.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

popn_bond_cutoff.docstring:
Determines the maximum length of a bond for a population analysis calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 3.0 ANG

basis_precision.docstring:
Controls the precision of the basis set by choosing the level of convergence of atomic energies with this basis set and pseudopotential.  Will be used to determine the value of CUT_OFF_ENERGY if not independently specified.
Modifiable: never
Allowed values: NULL, COARSE, MEDIUM, FINE, PRECISE, EXTREME
Default value : FINE

sedc_s6_g06.docstring:
Customisable S6 value for the damping function in the G06 semi-empirical dispersion/van der Waals correction scheme.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Default is determined by XC_FUNCTIONAL.

pspot_beta_phi_type.docstring:
Determines the representation of the <beta|phi> projectors.
Modifiable: never
Allowed values: REAL or RECIPROCAL
Default value : set to PSPOT_NONLOCAL_TYPE

elec_eigenvalue_tol.docstring:
Tolerance for accepting convergence of a single eigenvalue during DM/DIIS minimization. The difference between max and min energies over elec_convergence_win iterations must be less than this.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 10^-6 eV

efield_max_cycles.docstring:
The maximum number of SCF cycles in EFIELD calculation regardless of convergence.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 50

dipole_dir.docstring:
Specifies the direction of the spurious dipole-dipole interactions due to periodic boundary conditions. Can be 1D Cartesian x/y/z or (if DIPOLE_CORRECTION = SELF CONSISTENT) all 3D.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: X, Y, Z, A (=all)
Default value : Z

spin_treatment.docstring:
Choose the level of theory for treating the electronic spin.
Modifiable: never
Allowed values:
NONE (or PAIRED or FALSE) for a non-spin polarised calculation.
SCALAR (or COLINEAR, COLLINEAR, POLARISED or POLARIZED) for a spin polarised calculation.
VECTOR (or NONCOLINEAR or NONCOLLINEAR) for a non-collinear spin polarised calculation.
NB if VECTOR then cannot use certain other keywords such as NUP or NDOWN etc.
Default value : NONE

mix_charge_gmax.docstring:
Determines the maximum G-vector component of charge density to mix within DM scheme.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 1.5 /ANG

write_cell_structure.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to write the final structure in a CELL file format.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

grid_scale.docstring:
Determines the size of the standard grid as a multiple of the diameter of the cut-off sphere.
Modifiable: never
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 1.75

geom_tpsd_init_stepsize.docstring:
If GEOM_METHOD=TPSD
If GEOM_TPSD_INIT_STEPSIZE=0 then the default value is taken.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) >= 0.0
Default value : calculated based on system

geom_method.docstring:
Determines the method to use for geometry optimization.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: BFGS, LBFGS, DAMPEDMD, DELOCALIZED, FIRE, TPSD, PES
Default value : BFGS

impose_trs.docstring: NB This is an OBSOLETE form - please use NLXC_IMPOSE_TRS instead.

sedc_apply.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to apply any semi-empirical dispersion/van der Waals correction schemes.
Now optional - maintained in v8 onwards for backwards compatability reasons - better to turn SEDC on/off using SEDC_SCHEME=NONE or TS etc.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

geom_stress_tol.docstring:
Tolerance for accepting convergence of the maximum stress component during unit cell optimization.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 0.1 GPa

finite_basis_corr.docstring:
Determines whether or not to correct energy and stress for finite basis set when cell parameters change.
If =0 or NONE      then does no correction.
If =1 or MANUAL    then do manual correction using specified BASIS_DE_DLOGE.
If =2 or AUTOMATIC then do automatic correction using FINITE_BASIS_NPOINTS and FINITE_BASIS_SPACING.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: 0, 1, 2 or NONE, MANUAL, AUTOMATIC
Default value : NONE unless CALCULATE_STRESS or TASK requires moving atoms

md_eqm_ion_t.docstring:
Specify characteristic time for ions to use in enhanced MD equilibration method.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > MD_DELTA_T
Default value : MD_ION_T

max_scf_cycles.docstring:
The maximum number of SCF cycles in an electronic minimization regardless of  convergence.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 30

write_cst_esp.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to write out the electrostatic potential file for this run.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

phonon_sum_rule.docstring:
DEPRECATED way to explicitly correct the dynamical matrix to enforce the acoustic q=0 phonon sum rule, i.e. that 3 modes have zero frequency at q=0.
Should use PHONON_SUM_RULE_METHOD instead.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

popn_write.docstring:
Determines the level of output to <seed>.castep file with population analysis of the charge density.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: NONE, MINIMAL/SUMMARY, ENHANCED
Default value : ENHANCED

k_scrn_averaging_scheme.docstring: NB This is an OBSOLETE form - please use NLXC_K_SCRN_AVERAGING_SCHEME instead.

write_formatted_potential.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to write out final local potential to formatted file.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

phonon_dos_limit.docstring:
The largest phonon to be included in a phonon density-of-states calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > PHONON_DOS_SPACING
Default value : 5000.0 CM^-1

bs_perc_extra_bands.docstring:
The percentage of extra bands in a bandstructure calculation above NBANDS.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) >= 0.0
Default value : 0.0

nlxc_exchange_screening.docstring: NB This keyword has been removed.

md_hug_dir.docstring:
Specify how the cell is compressed in a Hugoniostat calculation.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: XDIR, YDIR, ZDIR, ISO, ISOTROPIC
Default value : ISO

phonon_preconditioner.docstring:
The preconditioning scheme used by the CG minimiser in LR.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: RTPA, TPA, PS, HR, NONE
Default value : TPA

nlxc_re_est_k_scrn.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to update the estimate of the k-screening length in Vxc as the density changes.
See also NLXC_K_SCRN_AVERAGING_SCHEME.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

write_bib.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to write a list of references used in this particular run in BibTeX format.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

write_bands.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to write out the bands file for this run.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

elec_method.docstring:
The treatment of metals or finite temperature insulator to be used.
An alias for METALS_METHOD.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: NONE (=ALLBANDS), DM, EDFT
Default value : DM

pdos_calculate_weights.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to do a partial DOS calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

elec_restore_file.docstring:
Name of file (ELEC_DUMP_FILE) to restore wavefunctions, density, etc from during a reuse/continuation. If set to NULL then nothing will be read.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: up to 255 character filename
Default value : NULL

magres_conv_tol.docstring:
Energy tolerance for accepting convergence during magres calculation.
The difference between max and min energy values over MAGRES_CONVERGENCE_WIN iterations must be less than this.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 10^-12 eV if MAGRES_METHOD=CRYSTAL or 10^-9 eV otherwise

spectral_task.docstring:
The type of electronic spectrum to calculate.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: BANDSTRUCTURE, DOS, OPTICS, CORELOSS, ALL
Default value : BANDSTRUCTURE

md_use_pathint.docstring:
Used to turn path integral MD on (true) or off.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

frequency_unit.docstring:
Controls the units used for all frequencies in output - many different units are supported.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Default value : CM-1

elnes_xc_definition.docstring:
The functional to use when calculating the exchange-correlation potential during an elnes calculation.
This version is a BLOCK keyword, with the flexibility to allow an arbitrary mixing of any of the basic ELNES_XC_FUNCTIONAL components.
Basic format: a series of separate lines, each containing <func> <weight> where <func> is the appropriate kernel for either eXchange or Correlation or both and <weight> is supposed to add to 1.0 for both eXchange and Correlation.
Modifiable: restart only
Default value : set by XC_FUNCTIONAL

tddft_selected_state.docstring:
The selected excited state for use during geometry optimisation or molecular dynamics.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 0
Default value : 0

wannier_print_cube.docstring:
The number of the (maximally localised) Wannier function to print out in .cube (+ .pdb) format file.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 0

k_scrn_den_function.docstring: NB This keyword has been removed.

velocity_unit.docstring:
Controls the units used for all velocities in output - many different units are supported.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Default value : ANG/PS

geom_max_iter.docstring:
Determines the maximum number of geometry optimization iterations.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= GEOM_CONVERGENCE_WIN
Default value : 30

secondd_method.docstring: Deprecated keyword - please use PHONON_METHOD instead

basis_de_dloge.docstring:
Derivative of total energy w.r.t. natural log of basis cut-off energy.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: (any)
Default value : 0.0

geom_force_tol.docstring:
Tolerance for accepting convergence of the maximum |ionic force| during geometry optimization.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 0.05 eV/ANG

phonon_sum_rule_method.docstring:
Selects a method to use when enforcing acoustic phonon sum rule.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values:
NONE       : No sum-rule correction will be applied.
RECIPROCAL : Correct dynamical matrix D(q) at each q using D(q=0).
REALSPACE  : Correct the real-space force constant matrix C(R).
REAL-RECIP : Correct C(R) in realspace followed by D(q) in reciprocal space.
MOLECULAR  : Correct D(0) using rotational as well as translational sum-rule.
MOLECULAR-1D : Correct D(0) for a linear molecule using rotational as well as translational sum-rule.
Default value : RECIPROCAL

nextra_bands.docstring:
The number of extra bands above nelectrons/2.
Necessary for metal or finite temperature insulator.
Modifiable: never
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 0
Default value : 0 if FIX_OCCUPANCY or 4 otherwise

popn_calculate.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to do a population analysis of the charge density.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : TRUE

entropy_unit.docstring:
Controls the units used for all entropy in output - many different units are supported.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Default value : J/MOL/K

pspot_nonlocal_type.docstring:
Specify the non-local pseudopotential representation.
Modifiable: never
Allowed values: REAL or RECIPROCAL
Default value : RECIPROCAL

tddft_nextra_states.docstring:
The number of extra states in a TDDFT calculation above TDDFT_NUM_STATES, these extra states are not checked for eigenvalue convergence.
Note: only used if TDDFT_SOLVER = DAVIDSON
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any integer) >= 0
Default value : set by floor(SQRT(TDDFT_NUM_STATES))

calculate_stress.docstring:
Specifies whether or not to perform a stress calculation.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

phonon_force_constant_cutoff.docstring:
The cutoff for the force constant matrix in a phonon calculation on a fine grid with supercell method.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) >= 0.0
Default value : 0.0

efield_oscillator_q.docstring:
Oscillator Q-factor for line-shape broadening in calculation of frequency- dependent permittivity.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 50.0

wannier_ion_moments.docstring:
Selects whether or not to compute ion multipole moments from maximally localised Wannier functions.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

ga_mutate_rate.docstring:
Probability of a mutation for each degree of freedom after GA crossover.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: 0.0 < GA_MUTATE_RATE < 1.0
Default value : 0.15

charge_unit.docstring:
Controls the units used for all charges in output.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: E, C
Default value : E

md_damping_scheme.docstring:
The scheme with which to calculate the optimal damping parameters for damped MD in geometry optimization. Can use independent modes algorithm, coupled modes algorithm or steepest descent dynamics.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: INDEPENDENT, COUPLED, STEEPESTDESCENTS
Default value : INDEPENDENT

md_extrap.docstring:
The wavefunction extrapolation scheme for molecular dynamics.
Also used for charge density extrapolation within DM scheme.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: NONE, FIRST, SECOND, MIXED
Default value : FIRST

opt_strategy_bias.docstring:
Controls the optimization strategy used:
+1,+2,+3 => increasing bias to speed optimisation;
0        => default optimisation;
-1,-2,-3 => increasing bias to memory minimisation.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: -3 <= (integer) <= 3
Default value : 0

phonon_write_dynamical.docstring:
Selects whether to write out the reciprocal space dynamical matrices from a phonon  calculation (to the <seedname>.castep file).
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: TRUE or FALSE
Default value : FALSE

wannier_ion_cut_fraction.docstring:
In the real-space integration for the calculation of ion moments only this fraction of ion density will be included.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: 0.0 < WANNIER_ION_CUT_FRACTION < 1.0
Default value : 0.999

mass_unit.docstring:
Controls the units used for all masses in output - many different units  are supported.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Default value : AMU

tssearch_energy_tol.docstring:
Tolerance for accepting convergence of the maximum energy difference during NEB search.
Modifiable: restart and on the fly
Allowed values: (any) > 0.0
Default value : 0.00002 HARTREE

nlxc_div_corr_npts_step.docstring:
Step in number of points used when testing convergence of the intergal for the divergence correction.
Modifiable: restart only
Allowed values: (any integer) > 0
Default value : 6
